<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>A helper function which can be called from client scripts</description> <name>sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX</name> <script><![CDATA[var sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX = Class.create(); sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getNextOrderNumber : function() { var itemStagingSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sc_ic_item_staging");
return sc_ic_Factory.getWrapperClass(sc_ic.APRVL_DEFN_STAGING).getNextOrderNumber(itemStagingSysId); },
isPublic: function() { return false; },
type: 'sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>nigel.bell</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-01-29 18:26:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>31389c0eeb2211003623666cd206fe48</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>sc_ic_ApprovalDefnStagingAJAX</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_31389c0eeb2211003623666cd206fe48</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-03-11 17:56:01</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>454</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
